Key Match Events: Scotland took the lead through Ryan Christie in the 33rd minute, Igor Matanovic equalized for Croatia three minutes later, Andrej Kramaric scored the winning goal for Croatia in the 70th minute, Che Adams had a last-gasp equaliser disallowed by VAR in the fifth minute of added time
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland were left with a depleted squad in Croatia, with over a dozen players unavailable through injury
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Clarke was left wondering if Scotland's luck will turn after their defeat
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Scotland's first Nations League match since November 2022
